SEARCH
Package database

Class CampDB

java.lang.Object
database.CampDB
public class CampDB extends Object
The CampDB class represents a database for managing camps. It provides methods to retrieve, add, update, and delete camps, as well as retrieve attendees and committee members for a camp. This class follows the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance throughout the application.

    • getInstance

      public static CampDB getInstance()

    • getAllCamps

      public HashMap<String,Camp> getAllCamps()
      Retrieves a copy of all camps in the database.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing all camps.

    • getCamp

      public Camp getCamp(String campID)
      Retrieves a specific camp based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Camp object or null if not found.

    • addCamp

      public boolean addCamp(String campID, Camp camp)
      Adds a new camp to the database.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to add.
      camp - The Camp object to add.
      Returns:
      True if the camp is added successfully, false if the camp ID already exists.

    • getCampDetails

      public CampInformation getCampDetails(String campID)
      Retrieves camp details based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp.
      Returns:
      The CampInformation object or null if the camp is not found.

    • updateCamp

      public boolean updateCamp(String campID, Camp updatedCamp)
      Updates an existing camp with new information.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to update.
      updatedCamp - The updated Camp object.
      Returns:
      True if the camp is updated successfully, false if the camp ID does not exist.

    • deleteCamp

      public boolean deleteCamp(String campID)
      Deletes a camp based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the camp is deleted successfully, false if the camp ID does not exist.
